title: How to understand ebike and escooter battery specs
content:
If you’re shopping for your first ebike or electric scooter, you might be a bit confused by the numbers you see on the spec sheet. What exactly is a watt-hour(Wh), and how is it different from an amp-hour(Ah)? Does voltage matter? How big of a battery do I really need? With the help of some basic physics and arithmetic, we’re here to help you make sense of these numbers. Which spec tells me the battery capacity?
